Text.val: 13.05.2011 SH SCR16448 Replaced GNRL_CURRENCY by ADMN_CURRENCY

STP.TXT: E R R O R : P A R A M E T E R pi.DATE (DD-MM-YYYY) W R O N G / N O T S U P P L I E D

SQL_STMT_U.val:
select
LGCC_ACCC_ACCT_ADMNO, LGCC_ACCC_ACCT_CLNTNO, cast (sum (LGCC_AMOUNTC) as decimal (13,2)), cast(sum (LGCC_AMOUNTH) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/LGCC where LGCC_DATE between ':2' and ':3' and (LGCC_LDGR_NO=30404 or LGCC_LDGR_NO=30435 or LGCC_LDGR_NO=30456)
group by LGCC_ACCC_ACCT_ADMNO, LGCC_ACCC_ACCT_CLNTNO order by LGCC_ACCC_ACCT_ADMNO, LGCC_ACCC_ACCT_CLNTNO
for fetch only optimize for 100 rows

select cast(sum(cmon_totiguarantees) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/cmon where cmon_admno = :2 and cmon_currency = ':3' and cmon_year = :4 and cmon_month = :5 and cmon_clntno <> 99999
for fetch only optimize for 100 rows
